entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:48 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 10:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %

Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries or rain showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
